data.comment: The match has started.
Ismail Elfath signals a free kick to Orlando in their own half.
In the minute 2, Ball safe as Orlando is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Orlando in the half of Portland.
Ismail Elfath signals a Portland throw-in in Orlando's half.
In the minute 5, It's a goal kick for the away team in Orlando.
Ismail Elfath signals a free kick to Orlando.
Throw-in for Portland at ESPN Wide World of Sports Complex.
In the minute 8, Throw-in for Portland in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Portland awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 13, Throw-in high up the field for Orlando in Orlando.
Goal kick for Orlando at ESPN Wide World of Sports Complex.
Orlando needs to be cautious. Portland have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 16, Portland have a dangerous throw-in.
Attention is being given to Portland’s Jeremy Ebobisse and play has been suspended briefly.
Jeremy Ebobisse is back on the pitch.
In the minute 20, Orlando have been awarded a corner by Ismail Elfath.
Ismail Elfath awards the away team a throw-in.
Orlando to take a throw-in in Portland territory.
In the minute 23, Portland will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Orlando.
Free kick for Portland in their own half.
Throw-in Portland.
In the minute 25, Throw-in for Portland in the half of Orlando.
Ismail Elfath awards Orlando a goal kick.
Free kick Portland.
In the minute 27, Goal! Portland take a 1-0 lead through a well-placed header from Larrys Mabiala.
Great play from Diego Valeri to set up the goal.
Portland awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 29, Orlando awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Marvin Loria for Portland gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Orlando goal kick.
In the minute 31, Throw-in for Orlando at ESPN Wide World of Sports Complex.
Portland have a goal kick.
Portland's Sebastian Blanco gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 36, Orlando have a goal kick.
Can Orlando get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Portland's half?
Goal! Mauricio Pereyra levels the match at 1-1.
In the minute 39, Nani instrumental with a fine assist.
Ismail Elfath signals a free kick to Orlando in their own half.
In Orlando a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 44, Larrys Mabiala (Portland) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Portland awarded a free kick in their own half.
The 1st half is prolonged by 4 minutes of added time.
In the minute 45, Free kick Portland.
Ismail Elfath signals a free kick to Orlando.
Free kick for Portland in their own half.
In the minute 45, The first-half has come to a close in Orlando.
Ismail Elfath has blown to start the second-half.
In the minute 47, Portland awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Orlando a free kick has been awarded the home team.
At ESPN Wide World of Sports Complex, Antonio Carlos has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Diego Valeri of Portland smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 52, Portland's Sebastian Blanco gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Orlando defender.
Corner awarded to Portland.
Portland have been awarded a corner by Ismail Elfath.
In the minute 53, Throw-in for Portland in their own half.
Nani of Orlando gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a Portland goal kick.
In the minute 55, Ismail Elfath awards the home team a throw-in.
Ball safe as Portland is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Goal kick for Portland at ESPN Wide World of Sports Complex.
In the minute 57, Throw-in Orlando.
Free kick for Portland in their own half.
Ismail Elfath signals a throw-in for Portland, close to Orlando's area.
In the minute 59, Throw-in for Portland close to the penalty box.
Ismail Elfath signals a free kick to Orlando in their own half.
In the minute 63, Free kick in a good position for Portland!
Joao Moutinho (Orlando) has received a yellow card from Ismail Elfath.
Portland pushes forward through Diego Valeri, whose finish on goal is saved.
Corner awarded to Portland.
In the minute 66, Corner awarded to Portland.
Dario Zuparic is on target to give Portland a 2-1 advantage.
That's a fine assist from Jeremy Ebobisse.
Ismail Elfath signals a free kick to Orlando just outside Portland's area.
In the minute 68, Giovanni Savarese (Portland) is making a first substitution, with Andy Polo replacing Marvin Loria.
The home team replace Jeremy Ebobisse with Jaroslaw Niezgoda.
In the minute 69, Free kick for Orlando in their own half.
Free kick for Orlando in the half of Portland.
Diego Chara (Portland) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 71, Orlando have been awarded a corner by Ismail Elfath.
Ismail Elfath awards Portland a goal kick.
Orlando make their second substitution with Junior Urso replacing Jhegson Mendez.
In the minute 71, Benji Michel is on a sub for Chris Mueller for Orlando.
Orlando are in shooting range from this free kick.
Portland's Jorge Villafana has been booked in Orlando.
In the minute 73, Nani for Orlando has been booked by Ismail Elfath and receives a first yellow card.
Orlando advance rapidly upfield but Ismail Elfath blows for offside.
Can Orlando capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Portland's half?
In the minute 74, Portland awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ismail Elfath awards the home team a throw-in.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Orlando.
In the minute 79, Free kick Portland.
Ismail Elfath signals a free kick to Portland in their own half.
Free kick for Orlando in the half of Portland.
Oscar Pareja is making the team's third substitution at ESPN Wide World of Sports Complex with Daryl Dike replacing Tesho Akindele.
In the minute 81, Santiago Patino is replacing Oriol Rosell for Orlando at ESPN Wide World of Sports Complex.
Orlando's Robin Jansson breaks free at ESPN Wide World of Sports Complex. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 82, Portland have a goal kick.
Goal kick for Orlando at ESPN Wide World of Sports Complex.
Ruan is booked for the away team.
In the minute 85, Ismail Elfath waits before resuming play because Diego Valeri for Portland is still down.
Ismail Elfath signals a free kick to Orlando in their own half.
In the minute 87, Portland’s Diego Valeri is on his feet again at ESPN Wide World of Sports Complex.
Portland awarded a free kick in their own half.
Kyle Smith is replacing Ruan for the away team.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Ismail Elfath signals a free kick to Orlando.
In Orlando a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 89, The home team have replaced Sebastian Blanco with Felipe Mora. This is the third substitution made today by Giovanni Savarese.
Can Portland capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
The fourth official's board shows 5 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
In Orlando, Portland push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
Orlando to take a throw-in in Portland territory.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Orlando close to the penalty box.
In Orlando Orlando attack through Benji Michel. The finish is off target, however.
Ismail Elfath awards Portland a goal kick.
Corner awarded to Orlando.
Throw-in for Portland at ESPN Wide World of Sports Complex.
Portland have been awarded a corner by Ismail Elfath.
The match has come to a close in Orlando. The final score is 2-1.
Diego Valeri, who was grimacing earlier, has been substituted. Bill Tuiloma is the substitute for Portland.
